title: Fps Randomly Dropping
body:
My Pc is Windows 7 ultimate and for some unknown reason every time in game my fps randomly drops from 30-2 and stays there for about 5-7 minutes ( an approximation ) I've literally tried everything and yet it my fps still does the same thing over and over. Its been 5 months with this problem which caused me to decrease on the number of game i actually play in one day. Now with this issue i cant even get outta bronze -_-
Can someone please help. 
Riot i need your assistance on this asap. Spent too much money on this game to give it up like that.

replies.body: There could be a specific animation or occurrence that may be causing your fps to drop, but there's actually some other possibilities as well.  These include outdated drivers, or even the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which was recently auto-enabled in a Windows 10 update and causing problems for some players.  As your first step, I recommend making sure that xbox bar is disabled.  If you still have any issues, use our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for the fix!  Let me know if you have any questions.
